name: pgo
description: PostgreSQL dedicated ORM with automatic database sync

scripts.test:
echo .gitignore > .npmignore ; cat .gitignore >> .npmignore ; echo test >> .npmignore
  ./node_modules/.bin/jshint lib test || exit 1
  ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive test

author: Daniele Ricci https://bitbucket.org/cicci
